name: domain_analysis
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool domain_analysis.
Tool description: Analyze and evaluate domain names for their value and ROI with enriched Whois API data for domainrs and SEO professionals - More at: bishopi.io
API description: Analyzes a given domain and retrieves various metrics such as domain length, past sales, and number of mentions using the RapidAPI service.

domain.description: The domain name to be analyzed. Defaults to 'dailynews.com'.
